title: Player very abusive...
body:
I was playing LoL today, and met a teammates who called me a pussy %%%%%% %%%got several time, and also told me to kill myself several times. I have screenshots that I can provide, but I want to see something done about this if you're serious about verbal abuse. This is a game and noboody should have to deal with this level of hatred.


https://imgur.com/a/NGVdL
https://imgur.com/a/kEchg

replies.body: This behavior and language are absolutely not allowed. I'm not exactly sure myself just what has gone wrong, but I can personally assure you this kind of thing won't be allowed, and it's already been investigated with appropriate action taken.

put in a support ticket. I had a group that did it and the support ticket must of banned or gave them a warning because the next time I logged onto my account I had a message saying actions were taken.
can you tell me how to put in a support ticket?
